permissionErrorDialog.description: Toby requires access to your Google Drive to function properly. This access is used to store your data and generate your declaration file. Toby can only access files it creates on your Google Drive and cannot view or modify any other content. If you'd like to proceed, please try again and grant the required permissions.
permissionErrorDialog.title: Google Drive Access Required

tooltips.lastCallToSubmit: This declaration should be submitted now
tooltips.manuallySubmitted: This declaration has been manually submitted
tooltips.timeToSubmit: This declaration could now be submitted

submitWarning.description: An email will be sent to the administration using your Gmail account. After submitting the declaration, please check your Gmail outbox to confirm it was successfully sent. If it wasnâ€™t, please submit the declaration manually.
submitWarning.title: Warning

warning.description: Please review all information carefully before proceeding. Toby cannot be held responsible for any errors in your declaration.
warning.title: Please review

landing.hero:
Submit your TST declaration
in minutes.

infoDialog.description: You'll be redirected to Google to grant Toby access to your Google Drive and Gmail accounts.

drive.descripton: All your Toby data is stored in a dedicated folder in your Google Drive account, and Toby will only have access to those files. This ensures that your personal data remains safe and is only accessible by you.
drive.title: Google Drive

gmail.descripton: By granting Toby access to your Gmail account, you'll be able to send your declaration to the administration with a single click. Toby cannot access your mailbox.
gmail.title: Gmail

infoDialog.title: Connect your Google account
